## Making a Model Based On Points Documentation 

The basic principle of this app is very simple. User must choose several points on the plot (at least 2), 
then push the submit button. App will calculate slope and intercept of model, built on these data points. 


### Which dataset model uses

This app is build on "mtcars" dataset in R.
